nodes.description: 一辆超载的卡车周六一早接近了摩加迪沙的一个安全检查站。
nodes.support_text: an overloaded truck covered with a tarpaulin approached a security checkpoint outside Mogadishu early Saturday.

nodes.description: 士兵因卡车可疑而命令司机停车并下车。
nodes.support_text: The truck, covered in dust, aroused the suspicions of soldiers who ordered the driver to park and get out.

nodes.description: 司机打电话给一位知名人士，后者说服士兵让卡车进入市区。
nodes.support_text: The driver, a man who soldiers said behaved in a friendly manner, made a phone call to someone in the capital. The driver passed the phone to the soldiers to speak to a well-known man who vouched for the truck and persuaded soldiers to allow it into the city, said the Somali intelligence official.

nodes.description: 卡车随后加速冲过另一个检查站，期间士兵开火。
nodes.support_text: Once through the checkpoint, the truck began to speed along the sandy, potholed road and raced through another checkpoint where soldiers opened fire and flattened one of its tires.

nodes.description: 卡车炸弹爆炸，造成300多人死亡。
nodes.support_text: The most powerful bomb blast ever witnessed in Somalia's capital has killed more than 300 people, with hundreds more injured.

nodes.description: 爆炸还导致近400人受伤，许多人失踪。
nodes.support_text: Another nearly 400 were wounded. Scores remain missing.

nodes.description: 索马里政府将袭击归咎于青年党极端组织。
nodes.support_text: Somalia’s government has blamed Saturday’s attack on the al-Shabab extremist group, which often targets Mogadishu but has not commented.

nodes.description: 青年党极端组织尚未对此次袭击发表评论。
nodes.support_text: Somalia’s government has blamed Saturday’s attack on the al-Shabab extremist group, which often targets Mogadishu but has not commented.

nodes.description: 周三，数千人走上街头抗议这次致命袭击。
nodes.support_text: As thousands of people took to the streets of Somalia’s capital Wednesday in a show of defiance after the country’s deadliest attack

nodes.description: 安全部队在试图驱散抗议者时开火，导致至少三人受伤。
nodes.support_text: At least three people, including a pregnant woman, were injured after security forces opened fire while trying to disperse protesters marching toward the attack site, said police Capt. Mohammed Hussein.

nodes.description: 官员们宣布已有两人被捕。
nodes.support_text: They said two people have been arrested.

nodes.description: 官员们分享了关于周六卡车炸弹袭击如何实施的详细说明。
nodes.support_text: 官员们分享了关于周六卡车炸弹袭击如何实施的详细说明。

nodes.description: 市长塔比特·阿卜迪发表讲话，号召解放城市。
nodes.support_text: 市长塔比特·阿卜迪发表讲话，号召解放城市。
“we must liberate this city which is awash with graves.”

nodes.description: 警察局长穆罕默德·侯赛因陈述了该事件。
nodes.support_text: 警察局长穆罕默德·侯赛因陈述了该事件。

nodes.description: 一名索马里情报官员正在调查爆炸事件。
受惊的居民称这次爆炸为最强大的（爆炸）。
nodes.support_text: 受惊的居民称这次爆炸为最强大的（爆炸）
